channel.title: How do i make!
channel.description: how do i make certain areas teleport you to a alternate starting place when you die. and how do i make it so you dont lose items in a certain area. sorry for being such a hassle

item.title: How do i make!
item.dc:creator: @pies pies
item.description:
@pies wrote:

Log into your server,
Stand at the coords where you appear when you die,
Take one of the coords, E.G: 5965 and search for this in client.JAVA
Edit the coords acordingly to where you want to respawn when you die.

Read full topic
